reviews.text: Yes, the staff was very friendly and helpful, and, yes, the hostel attracts a nice crowd of friendly, but not crazy travelers. Having said that, I was somewhat disappointed by this hostel given its Trip Advisor ranking.
reviews.title: Friendly staff, but unexceptional location, facilities

reviews.text: First, the location is safe and adequate (a few blocks from the Independencia Subte station and a few blocks further from lively San Telmo), but it is also quite desolate and empty of interesting places to shop, eat, and drink; this is especially the case on weekends.
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text: Second, facilities are adequate, but in need of a deep clean. Sheets had a mystery stain and bathroom tile grout was brown.
reviews.title: One of the best hostels I have ever been.

reviews.text: With a bit more attention to detail, this could be a four-star hostel in a so-so location.
reviews.title: Great experience!

reviews.text: I have stayed more than 2 weeks in Arrabal and if you are looking for a clean and well located hostal with a sociable athmosphere, I can strongly recommend this place. Special thanks go to the team around Mariana y Marcio who have been always incredibly friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: Hostel Arrabal
